name: Desert Tale
description:
Control a funny Raccoon and collect coins.

-Runner, platformer and mixed modes.

-Normal and infinite modes.

-Jump between platforms and shoot the enemies!

-Infinite levels with variable details.

-Day/night cycles with automatic lights.

-Collect 100 coins on normal levels for advance

Controls:

Left and right arrows for move the Raccoon on platformer levels.

Spacebar for jump

Up arrow for shoot
